title: Riot, as a Diamond Warwick Jungle Main, here are my thoughts on reworking Warwick.
body:
I'm 100% open to a Warwick rework. However I feel Warwick has been defined as a champion by certain abilities and features and of which I feel it best to include the following in the rework, as they define Warwick for me:

* The Blood Scent ability kept in some way
* A suppression ultimate of any kind

With Everything and anything else changed, he would still essentially feel similar to the current Warwick. What I wouldn't mind seeing in a rework:

* A skillshot
* An ultimate that needs to be channeled
* A stun ability (not ultimate) and a potentially unique, different (non suppression) ultimate

Although Warwick has gotten me to Diamond (and still climbing!), I feel he is well due for an update, and can easily become a champion enjoyable to all, with not just freaks like me who love to play the most basic champion over and over again. :D

Also, check out my [**Warwick guide here**](http://www.lolking.net/guides/361994) if you're looking to gain some elo!
